users.message: Dear Hiring Manager,I am writing to express my interest in transitioning into the IT field as a Software Developer, driven by a strong and sustained passion for software development. While my formal work experience may come from a different background, my consistent hands-on involvement in building real-world applications has firmly shaped my career direction toward technology.Overtime,IhavedevelopedandworkedonmultipleprojectsusingAngular,React,andReactNative,focusingoncreatingfunctional,user-focusedapplications.Ihavealsobuiltlogic-intensiveprojectsusingMQL5,whichstrengthenedmyproblem-solvingskillsandmyabilitytoworkwithstructured,performance-sensitivecode.Theseexperienceshavegivenmepracticalexposuretoapplicationarchitecture,authenticationflows,debugging,andwritingmaintainablecode.Whatdrawsmetosoftwaredevelopmentistheprocessofturningideasintoworkingsystemsandcontinuouslyimprovingthemthroughlearningandexperimentation.Iactivelyupskillmyself,exploremoderndevelopmentpractices,andenjoysolvingtechnicalchallengesthatrequirebothanalyticalthinkingandcreativity.IamnowseekinganopportunitywhereIcancontributeasadeveloper,growwithinaprofessionalengineeringenvironment,andaddvaluethroughdedication,adaptability,andastrongwillingnesstolearn.Iamconfidentthatmyhands-onexperienceandgenuineenthusiasmforsoftwaredevelopmentwillallowmetoquicklyintegrateandcontributeeffectivelytoyourteam.Thankyouforconsideringmyapplication.Iwouldwelcometheopportunitytodiscusshowmyskillsandmotivationalignwithyourorganizationsgoals.Sincerely,DavidRaja
